# powerplatform_analytics_data_exports (Data Source)

Analytics Data Export configurations. See [documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/set-up-export-application-insights) for more details.

**Note:** This resource is available as **preview**

**Known Limitations:** This resource is not supported for with service principal authentication.

## API Endpoints

| Terraform Operation | HTTP Method | API Endpoint URL (Public Cloud)                                    |
| ------------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Read                | `GET`       | `https://<geo>.csanalytics.powerplatform.microsoft.com/api/v2/connections` |

## Attribute Mapping

| Resource Attribute         | API Response JSON Field |
| -------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `id`                       | `id`                    |
| `source`                   | `source`                |
| `environments`             | `environments`          |
| `status`                   | `status`                |
| `sink`                     | `sink`                  |
| `package_name`             | `packageName`           |
| `scenarios`                | `scenarios`             |
| `resource_provider`        | `resourceProvider`      |
| `ai_type`                  | `aiType`                |

### Example API Response

An example of the API response can be found [here](https://github.com/microsoft/terraform-provider-power-platform/blob/main/internal/services/analytics_data_export/tests/datasource/Validate_Read/get_analytics_data_exports.json).

### `status` Block

| Resource Attribute | API Response JSON Field |
| ------------------ | ----------------------- |
| `name`             | `name`                  |
| `state`            | `state`                 |
| `last_run_on`      | `lastRunOn`             |
| `message`          | `message`               |

| Resource Attribute    | API Response JSON Field |
| --------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `id`                  | `id`                    |
| `type`                | `type`                  |
| `subscription_id`     | `subscriptionId`        |
| `resource_group_name` | `resourceGroupName`     |
| `resource_name`       | `resourceName`          |
| `key`                 | `key`                   |
